JWTFilter
Filters incoming requests and installs a Spring Security principal if a header corresponding to a valid user is found.
LoginDto
LoginDto is a class used to hold the user login information that's sent from the client to the server for the login endpoint.
LoginResponseDto
LoginResponseDto is a class used to hold both the authentication token and the user information that's returned from the server to the client from a login endpoint.

Model class that represents a single order
OrderBouquet
Model class containing the ordered bouquet and the personalized message

OrdersDao

OrdersService
Service class to support CRUD operations for Orders
RegisterUserDto
RegisterUserDto is a class used to hold the registration information for a new user that's sent from the client to the server for the register endpoint.
